EaiObjectMap.Comments: 14082025- SG Added IC Map - EGW_SF_Order_Details for EGW Mobility
EaiObjectMap.Name: VF Submit Order Data Map

EaiComponentMap.Comments: Thulsi: 28/12/2015 - Added SearchSpec for R16.1 MSOD
EaiComponentMap.Name: FS Shipment_to_FS Shipment
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: (([Orders.Order Sub Type] = "Fulfilment") OR (([Orders.Order Sub Type] = "Modify" OR [Orders.Order Sub Type] = "Change Proposition") AND ([Orders.Fulfilment Order Number] IS NULL)))

EaiFieldMap.Comments: JS: Updated Source Expression for MSOD.

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Shipping Notification Method] = "Email","EMAIL",IIF([Shipping Notification Method] = "TXT","SMS",IIF([Shipping Notification Method] = "Email and TXT","BOTH",IIF([Shipping Notification Method] = "None","NONE",[Shipping Notification Method]))))

EaiFieldMap.DestinationFieldName: VF Ship To Contact First Name
VF Ship To Contact Last Name

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([VHA Secondary Device Flag] IS NOT NULL,[VHA Secondary Device Flag],"N")

EaiComponentMap.Name: IMEI_to_Order Item XA IMEI
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: (([Orders.Order Sub Type] = "Modify" AND [Orders.VF Order Type TBUI] = "Refund APP") AND [Name] = "IMEI" AND [Text Value] IS NOT NULL)

EaiComponentMap.Name: Line Items_to_FBBLineItems
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: ([Service Type] = "NBN" OR [Service Type]="OPTICOM" OR [Service Type]="VISION") AND (([VF Root Service Order Type] <> "Modify" AND [VF Root Service Order Type] <> "Change Proposition") OR ([VF Action Code] <> "Deleted" AND ([VF Root Service Order Type] = "Modify" OR [VF Root Service Order Type] = "Change Proposition")))

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF ([VF Root Service Order Type] = 'Connect' AND [Network Element Type] = "NTD" AND [Service Id] <> "", "-", IIF ([VF Root Service Order Type] = 'Connect' AND [Network Element Type] = "UNI-DSL" AND [Service Id] <> "", "Update", IIF ([VF Root Order Sub Function] = "Change Location Disconnect", "Delete", [VF Action Code])))

IIF([VHA Root Serv Provider Ref] = 'VHA',IIF ([Product Sub Type Code] = "Product Specification", LookupValue('VHA_NBN_PRODUCT_TEMPLATE', "Version" + "|" + [Network Element Type] + "|" + [VHA Root Access Technology]), "1.0"),IIF ([Product Sub Type Code] = "Product Specification", LookupValue('VHA_NBN_PRODUCT_TEMPLATE', "TPGVersion" + "|" + [Network Element Type] + "|" + [VHA Root Access Technology]), "1.0"))

IIF([VHA Root Serv Provider Ref] = 'VHA',IIF ([Product Sub Type Code] = "Product Specification", LookupValue('VHA_NBN_PRODUCT_TEMPLATE', "Name" + "|" + [Network Element Type] + "|" + [VHA Root Access Technology]), [Network Element Type]),IIF ([Product Sub Type Code] = "Product Specification", LookupValue('VHA_NBN_PRODUCT_TEMPLATE', "TPGName" + "|" + [Network Element Type] + "|" + [VHA Root Access Technology]), [Network Element Type]))

EaiComponentMap.Name: Line Items_to_Line Items
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: IIF([VF Root Order Sub Function] = "Change Location Disconnect", ([Prepayment Type] <> "Sale" OR [Prepayment Type] IS NULL OR [Prepayment Type] = "") AND ([Id] = [Root Order Item Id] OR ([Service Type] = "NBN" OR [Service Type] = "Fixed MBB" OR [Service Type] = "Fixed NBN")), [Root Order Item Id] IS NOT NULL AND ([Prepayment Type] <> "Sale" OR [Prepayment Type] IS NULL OR [Prepayment Type] = ""))

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([VF Siebel Product Type] = LookupValue('VF_PROD_TYPE', 'NBN Speed Add On'), "",[Service End Date])

IIF([Sharing Lead MSISDN] IS NULL, [Conflict Id], IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Connect' AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member'), IIF([New MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Action]),IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Modify' OR [VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Change Proposition') AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member', IIF([MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Action]), IIF([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Change Proposition' AND [Sharing Action] = 'Existing Member', 'Add Member', [Sharing Action]))))

IIF([Sharing Lead MSISDN] IS NULL, [Conflict Id], IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Connect' AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member'), IIF([New MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Group Id]),IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Modify' OR [VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Change Proposition') AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member', IIF([MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Group Id]), [Sharing Group Id])))

IIF([Sharing Lead MSISDN] IS NULL, [Conflict Id], IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Connect' AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member'), IIF([New MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Lead MSISDN]),IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Modify' OR [VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Change Proposition') AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member', IIF([MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Lead MSISDN]), [Sharing Lead MSISDN])))

IIF([Sharing Lead MSISDN] IS NULL, [Conflict Id], IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Connect' AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member'), IIF([New MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing New Lead MSISDN]),IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Modify' OR [VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Change Proposition') AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member', IIF([MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing New Lead MSISDN]), [Sharing New Lead MSISDN])))

IIF([Sharing Lead MSISDN] IS NULL, [Conflict Id], IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Connect' AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member'), IIF([New MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Type]),IIF(([VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Modify' OR [VF Service Order Sub Type] = 'Change Proposition') AND [Sharing Action] = 'Add Member', IIF([MSISDN] = [Sharing Lead MSISDN], [Conflict Id], [Sharing Type]), [Sharing Type])))

IIF(([Product Type] = "Billing - MPP" OR [Product Type] = "Billing - GPP") AND [VF Root Service Order Type] = "Decon/Con Transfer FROM" AND [VHA Waive Charges] IS NOT NULL, [VHA Waive Charges], IIF([VHA Waive Charges] IS NOT NULL AND [Product Type]="Billing - APP", [VHA Waive Charges], (IIF(([Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInCredit" OR [Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInBonus") AND [VF Root Service Order Type] = "Decon/Con Transfer FROM","Y",(IIF([Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInCredit" AND [VF Root Service Order Type] = "Modify" AND [VHA Waive Charges] IS NOT NULL AND [VF Action Code]="Deleted",[VHA Waive Charges],"N"))))))
IIF([Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInCredit" OR [Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInBonus",[Asset Internal Integration Id],[Asset Integration Id])

EaiFieldMap.Comments: 17022025:Soumalya:Added new mapping for VHA Sequence for MSP R2.0
CM-3534:Added new field for BRMPackage mapping at line item level

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInCredit" OR [Product Type] = "Billing - GPP TradeInBonus",[Asset Internal Integration Id],[Related Asset Integration Id])

EaiFieldMap.Comments: Bhava 6/9/25: Created for Tallyman to PCC -1092
EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL, InvokeServiceMethod("VF Inbound MSISDN Mapping","GetRatePlan","ParOrdItemId="""+ [Id] + """","RatePlanName"),"")

EaiComponentMap.Name: TECH_FUND_Order_Details
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: [VF Tech Fund Account Number] IS NOT NULL

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF ([VF Prorata TF Plan Amt] IS NOT NULL,[VF Prorata TF Plan Amt],[VF TF Plan Amount])
IIf ([Tech Fund BAN] IS NOT NULL,"Hardware",[Account Type Code])

EaiComponentMap.Name: Line Items_to_ServiceOrders
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: [Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL AND ([VF Service Order Sub Type] <> "Change Proposition" OR ([VF Service Order Sub Type] = "Change Proposition" AND [VF Action Code] <> "Deleted"))

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([VF Order Sub Function] = LookupValue('VHA_ORDER_SUB_FUNCTION', 'Fibre Upgrade Disconnect') OR [VF Order Sub Function] = LookupValue('VHA_ORDER_SUB_FUNCTION', 'Fibre Upgrade SIM Swap'),"",[VF Order Sub Function])

EaiFieldMap.Comments: NIRMAL 07/09/2016 Edited Source exoression for PKE000000039818 // Thulsi: 04JAN2016 - Added Source Expr for R16.1 MSOD
EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Orders.Order Sub Type] <> "Fulfilment" AND [VF WBI Reason Code] = "Brightpoint","",[VF WBI Reason Code])
IIF([Access Technology] IS NULL, [Conflict Id],IIF([VF Network Identifier] = "OPTICOMM",EAILookUpExternal("OPTICOMM_ACCESS_TECHNOLOGY",[Access Technology]),[Access Technology]))
IIF([VHA SS Disconnect Flag] IS NOT NULL,[VHA SS Disconnect Flag],"N")
IIF([VHA Secondary Subs Flag] IS NOT NULL,[VHA Secondary Subs Flag],"N")

EaiFieldMap.Comments: VHA Muthushankari 11122017 - Added for R18.1 FTTC

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF((([&CustType] = "Sole Trader" OR [&CustType] = "Person" OR [&CustType] = "Local Registered Company") AND [Primary Organization] <> "Kogan" AND [&FulFilOrder] IS NULL),IIF([&ConEmlVal] = "Y","true","false"),"true")

IIF((([&CustType] = "Sole Trader" OR [&CustType] = "Person" OR [&CustType] = "Local Registered Company") AND [Primary Organization] <> "Kogan" AND [&FulFilOrder] IS NULL),IIF([&ConPhoneVal] = "Y","true",IIF(([&ConPhone] = LookupValue("VHA_PREPAY_NUM_SKIP", "PREPAY_NUM_SKIP")) AND [Bill Payment Method] ="Prepay","true","false")),"true")

EaiFieldMap.Comments: Bhava : Created for Tallyman to PCC

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF((([&CustType] = "Sole Trader" OR [&CustType] = "Person" OR [&CustType] = "Local Registered Company") AND [Primary Organization] <> "Kogan" AND [&FulFilOrder] IS NULL),IIF(([&ConDigUName] IS NOT NULL OR [VF Order Channel] = "EG Portal"),"false",IIF(LookupValue("VF_CR_ENABLE_FLAG", "SendAppInvite") = "Y","true","false")),"false")
IIF([VF Bulk Flag] IS NOT NULL,[VF Bulk Flag],[&BulkFlag])

EaiComponentMap.Name: Prepayments
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: [Payment Order Id] IS NOT NULL AND [Prepayment Status] = LookupValue("VHA_PREPAYMENT_STATUS","Success")

VF New SIM - EAI_to_VF New SIM - EAI

EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: [VF Parent Id] IS NULL AND [Type] <> "UniSIM Details"

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Address State],"")
IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Contact Birth Date],"")
IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Contact Email Address],"")
IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Contact First Name],"")
IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Contact Gender],"")
IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Contact Last Name],"")
IIF([Activation Key] IS NOT NULL,[Orders.VF Contact Title],"")

EaiComponentMap.Name: VHA NBN Order Details_to_VHA NBN Order Details

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([NBN Order Type] = 'Connect', IIF(([Service Provider Reference] = 'VHA' OR [Orders.VHA Override SPF] = 'Y'),LookupName('VHA_FBB_SUBMIT_ORDER_CONFIG', 'VHA NBN Billing Account') ,IIF([Service Provider Reference] = 'IINET', LookupName('VHA_FBB_SUBMIT_ORDER_CONFIG', 'VHA NBN Billing Account IINET'),LookupName('VHA_FBB_SUBMIT_ORDER_CONFIG', 'VHA NBN Billing Account TPG'))),"")
IIF ([Migration Order Flag] = 'Y' , "VHA_"+[Service Order Id]+"_MIG","VHA_"+[Service Order Id])

EaiComponentMap.Name: VHA NBN Order Logistics Details_to_VHA NBN Order Logistics Details

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Service Provider Reference] = 'IINET', LookupName('VHA_FBB_SUBMIT_ORDER_CONFIG', 'Billing ACCNT VISION TRANSACT'),LookupName('VHA_FBB_SUBMIT_ORDER_CONFIG', 'Billing ACCNT VISION FTTBW'))
IIF (Left([VHA NBN Order Details.Access Technology],5) = 'FTTBW' , 'Package Id','Offer Id')

IIF([NBN Order Type] = 'Connect' AND ([Order Sub function] IS NULL OR (([Order Sub function] = 'Change Location Across NW' OR [Order Sub function] = 'Change Location Within NW' OR [Order Sub function] = 'Change Technology Across NW') AND InStr([Access Technology], "FTTBW") > 0)),[Customer Reference Number],[Customer Reference Number2])

VHA Throttle Details_to_AdditionalInfo
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: [Line Items.Parent Order Item Id] IS NULL AND ([Line Items.VF Service Order Sub Type] <> "Change Proposition" OR ([Line Items.VF Service Order Sub Type] = "Change Proposition" AND [Line Items.VF Action Code] <> "Deleted"))

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF([Line Items.VF Network Identifier] = "OPTICOMM" AND [Network Element Type] = "NFAS",EAILookUpExternal("OPTICOMM_ACCESS_TECHNOLOGY",[Line Items.VHA Root Access Technology]),[Network Element Type])
